00028 #ifndef qep_pkg_h
00029 #define qep_pkg_h
00030 
00034 
00035 #include "qep_port.h"                                              // QEP port
00036 
00037 extern QEvent const QEP_reservedEvt_[];      
00038 
00040 enum QEPConst {
00041     QEP_EMPTY_SIG_ = 0,                
00042 
00044     QEP_MAX_NEST_DEPTH_ = 6
00045 };
00046 
00048 #define QEP_TRIG_(state_, sig_) \
00049     ((*(state_))(this, &QEP_reservedEvt_[sig_]))
00050 
00052 #define QEP_EXIT_(state_) \
00053     if (QEP_TRIG_(state_, Q_EXIT_SIG) == Q_RET_HANDLED) { \
00054         QS_BEGIN_(QS_QEP_STATE_EXIT, QS::smObj_, this) \
00055             QS_OBJ_(this); \
00056             QS_FUN_(state_); \
00057         QS_END_() \
00058     }
00059 
00061 #define QEP_ENTER_(state_) \
00062     if (QEP_TRIG_(state_, Q_ENTRY_SIG) == Q_RET_HANDLED) { \
00063         QS_BEGIN_(QS_QEP_STATE_ENTRY, QS::smObj_, this) \
00064             QS_OBJ_(this); \
00065             QS_FUN_(state_); \
00066         QS_END_() \
00067     }
00068 
00069 #endif                                                            // qep_pkg_h
